name: Thrusterdoom
description:
DESTROY H.M.S Thrusterdoom

CONTROLS:
WASD - steer
Space - glide and shoot
Shift - boost
Tab - change weapon
Glide to replenish boost

A game inspired by luftrausers made during summer break 2021 without internet.

By Tage Åkerström
Music by Mehdi Foroozandeh & Anton Wiklund
